common.network_error_message: Unable to connect to Surge, please try again.
common.surge_too_old: Your Surge is too old, please upgrade in order to use this application!
common.sw_updated: Surge Web Dashboard has been updated, refresh page to use the new version.

tls_instruction.title: Needed a certificate?
tls_instruction.description: Your connection has failed, possibly due to a lack of a certificate. Please follow the instructions (for Safari) below to install the certificate defined in your Surge configuration file.
tls_instruction.instruction1: 1. Click the download button below to download the certificate.
tls_instruction.instruction2: 2. Safari will warn you that your connection isn't safe. Click "Show Details" and then "Visit this website".
tls_instruction.instruction3: 3. Click "Install Certificate" and follow the instructions to install the certificate.
tls_instruction.instruction4: 4. You may need to select a device for installing the certificate.
tls_instruction.instruction5: 5. Go back here and try again.

new_version_alert.title: Found new version!
new_version_alert.message: Take a look at what's been update.

descriptions.scripting: Use JavaScript to extend the ability of Surge as your wish.
descriptions.modules: Override the current profile with a set of settings. Highly flexible for diverse purposes.
descriptions.device_management: Manage devices that are managed by Surge.
descriptions.http_capture: Turn on HTTP capture switch to dump and inspect the body.

confirm_reload_profile.title: Reload profile?
confirm_reload_profile.description: Please make sure the new version permits HTTP API usage, otherwise you won't be able to use this dashboard after this operation.
